commanders.name: Sliver Gravemother
commanders.oracleText:
The "legend rule" doesn't apply to Slivers you control.
Each Sliver creature card in your graveyard has encore {X}, where X is its mana value.
Encore {5} ({5}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Rukarumel, Biologist
cards.oracleText:
As Rukarumel enters, choose a creature type.
Slivers you control and nontoken creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other creature types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
{3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

cards.name: Regal Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters, Slivers you control get +1/+1 until end of turn if you're the monarch. Otherwise, you become the monarch."

cards.name: Taunting Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters, goad target creature an opponent controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

cards.name: Titan of Littjara
cards.oracleText:
As this creature enters, choose a creature type.
This creature is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may draw a card for each other creature you control that shares a creature type with it. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Lazotep Sliver
cards.oracleText:
Sliver creatures you control have afflict 2. (Whenever a creature with afflict 2 becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
Whenever a nontoken Sliver you control dies, amass Slivers 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Sliver. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Sliver Army creature token first.)

cards.name: Capricious Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn."

cards.name: Descendants' Fury
cards.oracleText: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice one of them. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with the sacrificed creature. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: For the Ancestors
cards.oracleText:
Choose a creature type. Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal any number of cards of the chosen type from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Hatchery Sliver
cards.oracleText:
Replicate {1}{G} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)
Each Sliver spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

cards.name: Bonescythe Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

cards.name: Cleansing Nova
cards.oracleText:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.name: Harsh Mercy
cards.oracleText: Each player chooses a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of a type chosen this way. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Galerider Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have flying.

cards.name: Synapse Sliver
cards.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.

cards.name: Crippling Fear
cards.oracleText: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Syphon Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have lifelink. (Damage dealt by a Sliver creature you control also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Spiteful Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker."

cards.name: Brood Sliver
cards.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

cards.name: Megantic Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control get +3/+3.

cards.name: Realmwalker
cards.oracleText:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As this creature enters, choose a creature type.
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

cards.name: Cloudshredder Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have flying and haste.

cards.name: Decimate
cards.oracleText: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

cards.name: Sliver Hivelord
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

cards.name: Icon of Ancestry
cards.oracleText:
As this artifact enters, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
{3}, {T}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card of the chosen type from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

cards.oracleText:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.name: Constricting Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters, you may exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield."

cards.name: Sentinel Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

cards.name: Sinew Sliver
cards.oracleText: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

cards.name: Diffusion Sliver
cards.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

cards.name: Distant Melody
cards.oracleText: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

cards.name: Shifting Sliver
cards.oracleText: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.

cards.name: Windfall
cards.oracleText: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

cards.name: Winged Sliver
cards.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have flying.

cards.name: Blur Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control get +2/+0.

cards.name: Striking Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

cards.name: Two-Headed Sliver
cards.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Cultivate
cards.oracleText: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.oracleText: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Venom Sliver
cards.oracleText: Sliver creatures you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Crystalline Sliver
